name.en: Special Topic: the mechanisms of neuropsychiatric disorder
name.ch: 專題研究:神經精神疾病機制

goal.en: "This course, a 2 credits course, aims to discuss the neuropathological mechanism of neuropsychiatric disorder. To better understanding the newest and advanced theory and diagnosis as well as treatment strategies, this course will be set as seminar through highly active discussion on high-impact publication. Student will be required to present three times throughout the course. The presentation is also a good training for student in public speaking. A good presentation does not only rely on scientific knowledge, also an excellent presentation skill. How to convey an informative but simplest science idea and/or result to both lay people and professional experts is challenge. Each presentation, student will get feedback on their science as well as overall presentation including presentation skills, power point organization. At the end of the semester, student will have deep understanding on neuropathology of neuropsychiatric disorder, also be confident to speak their research in public."
goal.ch: 此課程探討神經精神疾病的機制，利用最新的期刊論文來了解當前疾病的機制及治療方法。
